text:
I am wondering how many lines of code I have written even though it's not important :smiley:
Is there a tool which gives the number of lines a user wrote on GitHub? As that is where most of my code is.

elements.text: I am wondering how many lines of code I have written even though it's not important
Is there a tool which gives the number of lines a user wrote on GitHub? As that is where most of my code is.

text: might make you feel sick. I don't think there's an answer to that as it would have to crawl Git, and be able to differentiate between auto gen'd config files, etc.

elements.text: might make you feel sick. I don't think there's an answer to that as it would have to crawl Git, and be able to differentiate between auto gen'd config files, etc.

text: yeah and test files and best would be to not count duplicate code or a line which only added whitespace... :smile:

elements.text: yeah and test files and best would be to not count duplicate code or a line which only added whitespace...

text: One may find out that one's LOC is negative(!)
